properties.areaDesc: Leflore, MS; Webster, MS; Holmes, MS; Grenada, MS; Carroll, MS; Montgomery, MS
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 10 at 1:37AM CST until February 10 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
North central Holmes County in central Mississippi...
Central Carroll County in north central Mississippi...
Southeastern Grenada County in north central Mississippi...
Southeastern Leflore County in north central Mississippi...
Western Webster County in north central Mississippi...
Montgomery County in north central Mississippi...

* Until 230 AM CST.

* At 137 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seven Pines,
or near Black Hawk, moving northeast at 55 mph.

HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail
damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect
wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* This severe thunderstorm will be near...
Coila and Malmaison around 145 AM CST.
North Carrollton around 150 AM CST.
Winona around 200 AM CST.
Duck Hill and Elliott around 205 AM CST.
Sweatman around 215 AM CST.
Misterton and Gore Springs around 220 AM CST.

Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include
Carrollton.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement
agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service
office in Jackson.
